traffic_visible_response: *Under the Dome* is a documentary - style work about environmental protection.This work was produced by Chai Jing. It focuses on the problem of air pollution in China, especially the issue of smog. Through a large number of on - the - spot investigations, data analysis, and interviews with relevant personnel, it shows the causes, hazards, and impacts of air pollution, aiming to arouse public attention and concern about environmental issues and promote the improvement of environmental quality.
